thread.title: Cities Lament, Celebrate Amazon’s Finalists for HQ2

author: Allison Prang
title: Cities Lament, Celebrate Amazon’s Finalists for HQ2
text:
Shortly after Amazon Inc. announced the 20 metro areas it chose as finalists to be home to the company’s second headquarters, representatives from a number of cities and states tweeted their disappointment or their excitement over the technology giant’s picks.
Here’s a roundup of reactions from social media:
• The mayor of Jersey City, N.J.,...
